label: bowtie2
name: bowtie2
description: Bowtie2 is a popular tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences

label: Kanki iRods Client
name: kanki
description: This installs a graphical iRods client and will only work on instances with a GUI

label: Velvet
name: velvet
description: Installs Velvet, a sequence assembler for very short reads

label: Cufflinks
name: cufflinks
description: Installs Cufflinks, a tool for transcriptome assembly and differential expression analysis for RNA-Seq
